name: canvashelper
title: Canvas Helper
description: Complete Canvas LMS integration for Raycast - manage courses, check grades, track assignments, and navigate Canvas efficiently.
author: athitheya_gobinathan

commands.name: dashboard
commands.title: Go to Dashboard
commands.description: Quick access to your Canvas dashboard

commands.name: courses
commands.title: Courses
commands.description: View and manage your Canvas courses with quick navigation actions

commands.name: grades
commands.title: Grades
commands.description: Check your Canvas course grades with real-time data

commands.name: assignments
commands.title: Assignments
commands.description: Track next due assignments and view assignment statistics by course

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: Canvas API Token
preferences.description: Your Canvas API token (generate from Canvas Settings > API Keys)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
